灅字的基本解释

灅
lěi
〔灅水〕今中国河北省遵化市沙河的古称。

灅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lěi］
［《集韻》魯猥切，上賄，來。］
［《廣韻》魯水切，上旨，來。］
古水名。即今河北省遵化县沙河。源出县北长城外，南流经县西折西南注入庚水（即今沽河）。

灅字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　灅； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页662第18
【唐韻】力軌切【集韻】魯水切，?音壘。水名。【水經】水出右北平俊靡縣。　又【集韻】魯猥切，音磊。義同。　又與漯㶟同。或省作㵽。

灅字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
灅字的起名意思

暂无。

灅
Basic explanation of words
灅
lěi
〔灅水〕The ancient name of Shahe, Zunhua City, Hebei Province, China today.
灅
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lěi]
["Ji Yun" Lu Weiqie, bribe, come. ]
["Guangyun" Lu Shui cut, decree, come. ]
Ancient water name. Now Shahe, Zunhua County, Hebei Province. The source flows outside the North Great Wall of the county, and flows south through the county to the southwest and injects the Gengshui (that is, the present Gu River).
灅
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　灅; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 662 18
[Tang Yun] force track cut [Ji Yun] Lu water cut, sound barrier. Water name. [Water Classic] Water flows out of Junmi County, Beiping on the right.　[Jiyun] Lu Yuqie, Yin Lei. The same meaning.　Same as Luo Mi again. Or 省作㵽.
灅
